Header: NIshikori beats Anderson to line up Federer tie
Content: Japan’s Kei Nishikori beat South Africa’s Kevin Anderson 6-4 6-4 on Thursday to secure a spot in the Paris Masters quarter-finals against Roger Federer. The two also went head to head on last Sunday , only then it was Anderson’s day as he won the Vienna Open to secure a spot at the season-ending ATP finals.
